<tbody><tr><td>

[clone(node, options, device)](./alfa-dom.node.clone.md)


</td><td>

Creates a new `Element` instance with the same value as the original and deeply referentially non-equal. Optionally replaces child elements based on a predicate.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>

## Variables

<table><thead><tr><th>

Variable


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[composedNested](./alfa-dom.node.composednested.md)


</td><td>

Traversal options to traverse in shadow-including tree order and inside nested browsing context container, a common use case.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[flatTree](./alfa-dom.node.flattree.md)


</td><td>

Traversal options to traverse the flat tree.

[https://drafts.csswg.org/css-scoping-1/\#flattening](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-scoping-1/#flattening)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[fullTree](./alfa-dom.node.fulltree.md)


</td><td>

Traversal options to traverse all relevant nodes (flat tree and inside nested browsing container), a very frequent use case.


</td></tr>
